reviews.review_msg: If you can write a decent essay and pay attention, you should be fine in the class. Use your laptop to take notes, only way I could keep up.  Seems like a good guy, but is very left-wing/liberal and doesn't try to hide it.  He focuses more on social geog than physical, which is great for tests.  Overall, a decent class to get a good mark.
Your new best friend will be your laptop. Reads off slides, but doesn't post them. Nice guy though.
